duties_responsibilities.duty: Compile and analyze financial information for the preparation of tax returns
Assist with annual tax filing requirements for informational returns
Assist in responding to audit inquiries and informational requests from tax authorities
Research and document tax issues as required
Prepare various financial statements and reports
Assist in the maintenance of tax basis records
Participate in tax planning strategies that align with business goals
Monitor compliance with respect to changes in tax law
Follow industry trends and track changes related to taxes

education_certification.credential: 3-5 years' experience in the tax department of a large local, regional, or large public accounting firm
